channel.title: Help REP++
channel.description:
Error with player 1, Mark java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 100 at client.CreateProjectile(client.java: at client.rangeGFXNPC(client.java:3054) at client.process(client.java:18999) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler. at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
This is my range error, i am using delta and everytime I range it shoots the arrow but doesn't show the hitmark, this is wierd because I dont think I edited any of the range.

item.title: Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @123kdd100 123kdd100
item.description:
@123kdd100 wrote:

Thanks but wheres the array, where do i find it so i can re-edit it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:6, topic:364885”]The error was thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index. The index is either negative or greater than or equal to the size of the array.
http://download.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/java/lang/ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException.html[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help REP++
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

You must have changed the anim/hitmark out of the array so you get an Exception thrown back at you.

Read full topic
